text: Albert Vallvé i Navarro (2 December 1945 – 7 March 2021) was a Spanish politician. He was a member of the Senate of Spain from 1993 until 1996. He was born in Tarragona, Spain. He was a member of the Democratic Union of Catalonia. Vallvé died on 7 March 2021 in Tarragona, aged 75. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish politicians
title: Albert Vallvé
